{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BaudTec |model=RN243R4 |revision=-2T2R |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/18/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=XKR-RN243R4 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8672 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|802.11n WLAN ADSL2+ Router}} :[http://www.baudtec.com.tw/p_wlan%20adsl2+%20router_rn243r4.htm Product page]
"7000-831L-X1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The wireless chips is presumed to be RTL8192CE.
Default settings (barring the SSID) are from the FCC manual. The manual states the default SSID is '''RN243R4-v1'''.. but there are no hits for this SSID in WiGLE. :Possible 00:13:33 ('''BaudTec''') OUI
